metadata.inclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified
controller to include a device to the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to add your device,
press toggle up and release to include it in the network
metadata.exclusion:
1. Follow the instructions for your Z-Wave certified
controller to remove a device from the Z-Wave network.
2. Once the controller is ready to remove your device,
press toggle up or down to exclude it from the network
metadata.reset:
1. Quickly press ON (up) button three (3) times then
immediately press the OFF (down) button three
(3) times. 
Note: This should only be used in the event your
networkâ€™s primary controller is missing or otherwise
inoperable
